span.span: Provides support for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) XAML tooling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Klassen in diesem Namespace unterst端tzen die [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] und werden nicht direkt aus Ihrem Code verwendet werden.The classes in this namespace support the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and are not intended to be used directly from your code.
